thread.section_title: The Benjamin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Love this hotel
thread.title_full: Love this hotel - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: tiffanyn145
title: Love this hotel
text: I stayed here the weekend of 3/24 through 3/26. I had a one bedroom suite that was very clean and comfortable. The location was fantastic and the staff was so friendly. I would highly recommend this place. As far as noise comments that I read before staying here, it is NYC....there really is nothing you can do about the honking horns and sirens. By the end of the day we so exhausted we slept great as the beds were comfortable. Felt like a "home" and we were right outside the craziness and fun that Manhattan has to offer.
